modName: Daedric BOOST - Better Daedric Armor without overpowering
summary: Hello Everyone! Its time for a new mod! This is the Armor Version of Daedric BOOST. This mod powers the  Daedric Armor in strengh and efficientcy, without making the Armor too OP. Read the full Description for more info!
descriptionHtml:
Hello Everyone! This is the Armor Edition of "Daedric BOOST - Increases Daedric Weapons Damage".
This mod, boosts as the Name says, the Armor in strengh and efficientcy, without making it too overpowered.

Because of its early development, this mod could cause issues with other mods.

CHECK YOUR LOAD ORDER IF YOU THINK THIS MOD IS NOT WORKING!!!

MAKE SURE THAT THIS MOD IS SET TO LOAD LAST IN THE LOAD ORDER,
THEN YOU WILL MOSTLY ENCOUNTER NO CONFLICTS!

IF YOU USE WEAPON MODS, YOU MUST MAYBE CHANGE YOUR LOAD ORDER TO MINIMIZE PROBLEMS.
IF YOU ENCOUNTER ANY BUGS OR PROBLEMS WITH OTHER MODS, PLEASE WRITE THEM DOWN IN THE
COMMENT SECTION!!!

SORRY THE COMMENT SECTION IS CURRENTLY OFFLINE. IF YOU HAVE ANY ISSUES WITH MY MOD PLEASE CONTACT ME DIRECTLY! PLEASE DON`T SPAM!

BUT REMEMBER: THE COMMENT SECTION IS NOT USED FOR SPAMMING OR BOTHERING ME WITH MY ENGLISH, OR WITH PROBLEMS WITH THIS DESCRIPTION!!!

TRUST ME YOU WILL GET REPORTED, IF YOU DO NOT RESPECT MY ENGLISH OR THIS DESCRIPTION!!!!
author: happybuddergie

files.name: Daedric BOOST - Armor Edition
files.changelogHtml: 23.02.2014/9:14PM Initial Release, Currently maybe a bit OP this will change in future, Stable tested on 20+ Mods
